https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bnvj7h6AfWZIl9KJOHYwRX6fzcw.jpg Dogville: The Pilot was shot during 2001 in the pre-production phase to test whether the concept of chalk lines and sparse scenery would work. The 15-minute pilot film starred Danish actors Sidse Babett Knudsen (as Grace) and Nikolaj Lie Kaas (as Tom). Dogville: The Pilot
